person.persName: William A. Petit (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Petit. Father of Margaret Petit, Sarah Petit, Zachariah Petit, John M. Petit, Hetta Petit, Martha M. F. Petit, and William H. Petit. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 138.
